articles.title: Mitsubishi Electric to help modernize New York's subway - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Japanese company joins Siemens and Thales in supplying equipment for signal upgrades

articles.title: I now get characters who don't die: Breakout star Lee Yoo-mi on life after Squid Game and All of Us Are Dead - AsiaOne
articles.description: After playing two characters back-to-back that get killed off, it looks like South Korean actress Lee Yoo-mi might finally have a role where she gets to live. In a recent interview with Hankook Ilbo translated by Soompi, the 27-year-old said she's currently p…
articles.content:
After playing two characters back-to-back that get killed off, it looks like South Korean actress Lee Yoo-mi might finally have a role where she gets to live.

articles.title: Asia stock markets sink, oil hits 7-year high as Russia-Ukraine crisis escalates - The Straits Times
articles.description:
Brent crude futures jumped to a high of US$97.40 a barrel - their highest since September 2014.
. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE - Stock markets across Asia were in a sea of red, while oil prices hit seven-year highs amid the threat of a full-scale invasion of Ukraine by Russia.
The repercussions from likely sanctio… [+2110 chars]

articles.title: Xiang Yun victim of fake ads again, Entertainment News - AsiaOne
articles.description:
The actress warned that her image was being used on Facebook to sell traditional Chinese medicine, skin care products and jewellery.
. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE - Home-grown actress Xiang Yun's image has been misused yet again in fake advertisements.
